item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif"</a>> Watch out! You're in Wizard of Oz country - beware anyone called Dorothy or Toto!! The scarecrow would not look amiss in your garden - do you want me to chase the guy (Idon't have his contact details)?<br/><br/>Hope you continue to enjoy the trip - best wishes from all in Witnesham</p>
item.content:encoded:
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif“> Watch out! You’re in Wizard of Oz country – beware anyone called Dorothy or Toto!! The scarecrow would not look amiss in your garden – do you want me to chase the guy (Idon’t have his contact details)?

Hope you continue to enjoy the trip – best wishes from all in Witnesham
